text: nsawkm mawdie zare lkm, tadaeun alnutfat fi arhamhn, fayakhrj minha alawlad bmshyyt allh, fjamewhn fi mahalin aljmae fqt, wahu alqbl bi'ayi kayfiat shytm, wqaddimu li'anfusikum 'aemalana salihatan bmraeat 'awamir allh, wkhafu allh, waelamuu 'anakum mulaquh llhsab yawm alqyam. wbshshir almuminin -ayha alnby- bima yfrhhm wysrruhm min hasan aljaza' fi alakhrt
